content.text: {"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":20291,"originalJapaneseLine":"　馴染みやろ」「","translatedEnglishLine":"\"It's someone familiar.\""},{"lineNumber":20292,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………誰だっけ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Who was that again?\""},{"lineNumber":20293,"originalJapaneseLine":"わいわい言いながら、","translatedEnglishLine":"Chattering lively,"},{"lineNumber":20294,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランス達は通りすがり、去っていく。","translatedEnglishLine":"Lance and the others pass by and leave."},{"lineNumber":20295,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……………………ふっ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Hmph.\""},{"lineNumber":20296,"originalJapaneseLine":"　落ちる所まで落ちたか……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Have I fallen to the very bottom...?"},{"lineNumber":20297,"originalJapaneseLine":"（もう、いっそ野垂れ死ぬか……","translatedEnglishLine":"(Maybe I should just die out here in the wilderness..."},{"lineNumber":20298,"originalJapaneseLine":"　となれば、しっかり準備をして……）","translatedEnglishLine":"If that's the case, I better prepare properly...)"},{"lineNumber":20299,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あれ？　バーナードか！　久しぶりだな！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Oh? Bernard! Long time no see!\""},{"lineNumber":20300,"originalJapaneseLine":"「お前は……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"You are...\""},{"lineNumber":20301,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そうか、魔人討伐隊にいたのか。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I see, you were in the Demon Slaying Squad."},{"lineNumber":20302,"originalJapaneseLine":"　今は人も多いからな」","translatedEnglishLine":"There are many people now.\""},{"lineNumber":20303,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ああ……だが…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yeah... but...\""},{"lineNumber":20304,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ランスの奴はワガママ放題だろう？","translatedEnglishLine":"\"That Lance guy is selfish as usual, right?"},{"lineNumber":20305,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ボクも苦労させられているよ」","translatedEnglishLine":"He's causing me trouble too.\""},{"lineNumber":20306,"originalJapaneseLine":"「だけど、人類のために戦うと思えば、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"But when you think about fighting for humanity,"},{"lineNumber":20307,"originalJapaneseLine":"　辛いだの苦しいだの、言ってられないからな！」","translatedEnglishLine":"You can't complain about the hardships or pain!\""},{"lineNumber":20308,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ボクたちはボクたちで、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"We, as ourselves,"},{"lineNumber":20309,"originalJapaneseLine":"　やるべき事を為すだけだ」","translatedEnglishLine":"Just do what we have to do.\""},{"lineNumber":20310,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……………………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"................\""},{"lineNumber":20311,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そのうち、アイスフレームのメンバーで……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Someday, with the Iceframe members..."},{"lineNumber":20312,"originalJapaneseLine":"　またゆっくり話せるといいな」","translatedEnglishLine":"It'd be nice to talk again slowly.\""},{"lineNumber":20313,"originalJapaneseLine":"「隊長〜。閣下が呼んでますけど？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Captain~. Your Excellency is calling you.\""},{"lineNumber":20314,"originalJapaneseLine":"「またか。つまらない用事じゃないだろうな、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Again? It's not some trivial matter, is it?"},{"lineNumber":20315,"originalJapaneseLine":"　まったく……それじゃあな」","translatedEnglishLine":"Good grief... Well then.\""},{"lineNumber":20316,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……………………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"................\""},{"lineNumber":20317,"originalJapaneseLine":"「………………うむ。よし……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Hmm. Alright...\""},{"lineNumber":20318,"originalJapaneseLine":"再び、立ち上がる。","translatedEnglishLine":"He stands up once more."},{"lineNumber":20319,"originalJapaneseLine":"足に込めた力は、","translatedEnglishLine":"The strength put into his legs"},{"lineNumber":20320,"originalJapaneseLine":"まだ終わっていないと応えてくれる。","translatedEnglishLine":"responds that it's not over yet."},{"lineNumber":20321,"originalJapaneseLine":"「礼を言うぞ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I thank you."},{"lineNumber":20322,"originalJapaneseLine":"　…………………………えぇと」","translatedEnglishLine":"...................um,"},{"lineNumber":20323,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………………………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"....................\""},{"lineNumber":20324,"originalJapaneseLine":"「………………………………名前、なんだっけ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"............What was your name again?\""},{"lineNumber":20325,"originalJapaneseLine":"翌日――――","translatedEnglishLine":"The next day――――"},{"lineNumber":20326,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あぁ？　お前…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Huh? You...\""},{"lineNumber":20327,"originalJapaneseLine":"「………………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"........\""},{"lineNumber":20328,"originalJapaneseLine":"「バーニング・Ｂです。レ、レベルは50です」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I'm Burning B. My le-level is 50.\""},{"lineNumber":20329,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……………………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"................\""},{"lineNumber":20330,"originalJapaneseLine":"「新キャラです」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"A new character.\""},{"lineNumber":20331,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……………………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"................\""},{"lineNumber":20332,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………あっそ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...I see."},{"lineNumber":20333,"originalJapaneseLine":"　まあいい、精々盾になれ」","translatedEnglishLine":"Well, fine. At best, be a shield.\""},{"lineNumber":20334,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ええんや……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"That's fine...\""},{"lineNumber":20335,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……ふっ。世話の焼ける……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Hmph. Such a handful...\""},{"lineNumber":20336,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あぁん？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Huh?\""},{"lineNumber":20337,"originalJapaneseLine":"バーナードはこっそり、魔人討伐隊に居座った。","translatedEnglishLine":"Bernard quietly stayed in the Demon Slaying Squad."},{"lineNumber":20338,"originalJapaneseLine":"「私に戦争に加わりなさいって！？","translatedEnglishLine":"\"You want me to join the war!?"},{"lineNumber":20339,"originalJapaneseLine":"　冗談じゃないわ！　どうなってるのよ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"You must be kidding! What's going on!\""},{"lineNumber":20340,"originalJapaneseLine":"―　しばらく前　―","translatedEnglishLine":"- Some time ago -"}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス達は通りすがり、去っていく。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance and the others pass by and leave.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 落ちる所まで落ちたか……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Have I fallen to the very bottom...?
(Maybe I should just die out here in the wilderness...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: となれば、しっかり準備をして……）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If that's the case, I better prepare properly...)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あれ？　バーナードか！　久しぶりだな！」
「そうか、魔人討伐隊にいたのか。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I see, you were in the Demon Slaying Squad.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ランスの奴はワガママ放題だろう？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That Lance guy is selfish as usual, right?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ボクも苦労させられているよ」
「だけど、人類のために戦うと思えば、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "But when you think about fighting for humanity,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 辛いだの苦しいだの、言ってられないからな！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You can't complain about the hardships or pain!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: やるべき事を為すだけだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Just do what we have to do."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そのうち、アイスフレームのメンバーで……
またゆっくり話せるといいな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It'd be nice to talk again slowly."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「隊長〜。閣下が呼んでますけど？」
「またか。つまらない用事じゃないだろうな、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Again? It's not some trivial matter, is it?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まったく……それじゃあな」

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The strength put into his legs

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まだ終わっていないと応えてくれる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: responds that it's not over yet.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「バーニング・Ｂです。レ、レベルは50です」

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Well, fine. At best, be a shield."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: バーナードはこっそり、魔人討伐隊に居座った。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Bernard quietly stayed in the Demon Slaying Squad.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「私に戦争に加わりなさいって！？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "You want me to join the war!?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 冗談じゃないわ！　どうなってるのよ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You must be kidding! What's going on!"

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English
